# UnicodeScalarType

**Type Alias**

The default type for an otherwise-unconstrained unicode scalar literal.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias UnicodeScalarType = String
```

## Strings and Text

- **StringLiteralType**: The default type for an otherwise-unconstrained string literal.
- **ExtendedGraphemeClusterType**: The default type for an otherwise-unconstrained Unicode extended grapheme cluster literal.

items.description: The default type for an otherwise-unconstrained string literal.

items.description: The default type for an otherwise-unconstrained Unicode extended grapheme cluster literal.
